mods:mods.mods:abstract: Image consists of one round, blue, metal button. At centre is an image of a yellow and white globe with six figures surrounding the globe. At the top, in semi-circle, text reads:"March 8 - International Women's Day". Below the image, in semi-circle, text reads:"Le 8 mars - Journee internationale de la femme".
